articles.title: Artificial Brain Reveals The Genetic Origins of Autism Spectrum Disorder - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A new scientific technique using brain organoids – mini artificial brains grown in the lab – is revealing the genetic origins of autism spectrum disorder (ASD) hidden within our brains.
articles.content:
